concept.title: Updating documents
concept.shortdesc: You can update a document by using the upsert() or replace() methods.

conbody.note: See Couchbase Developer documentation on this topic:
conbody.p: The replace() method replaces a document that already exists with new contents. The upsert() method creates the document if it does not already exist.
